content.html: Something to be aware of when contributing code to an Open Source project. Every addition to a project has ongoing costs. Like gifting a pet, code still needs looking after. Package your addition with tests and docs will help offset those costs for the maintainer of the project
content.value:
Something to be aware of when contributing code to an Open Source project.

Every addition to a project has ongoing costs. Like gifting a pet, code still needs looking after.

Package your addition with tests and docs will help offset those costs for the maintainer of the project
